Description.Text: This is a brand new beachfront hotel featuring casual beachfront luxury and the festive ambiance of Clearwater Beach. The resort offers great Gulf views and all rooms feature ceiling windows with balconies offering views of the Gulf of Mexico.
Gulf front hotel on the Gulf of Mexico, right on Clearwater Beach's lively promenade.
Gulf Inspired Italian and Seafood Restaurant and Beachside Tiki Bar.
This accommodation has a medium lobby.
